summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Judicial Nominating Committee of the City of Dallas will convene on November 20, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss the appointment of full-time Municipal Judges and Associate Judges.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the June 25, 2024 meeting.
2. Deliberation on the recommendations from the Judicial Nominating Commission regarding the vacant judicial positions.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will enter an executive session to discuss the potential appointment and employment of judges, as permitted under Section 551.074 of the Texas Open Meetings Act. This session will focus on evaluating candidates for the full-time Municipal Judge and Associate Judge roles.

**Action Items**:  
The committee is seeking approval for the recommendations made by the Judicial Nominating Commission concerning the judicial vacancies. The outcome of this meeting will determine the next steps in filling these critical judicial positions within the city. 

The meeting will be accessible to the public both in-person and via video conference, ensuring transparency and community engagement.
